name: Slakoth

evolution.description: Slakoth can evolve into Vigoroth at level 6 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 9 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Slacker Pokémon. Slakoth's heart beats just once a minute. Whatever happens, it is content to loaf around motionless. It is rare to see this Pokémon in motion.

abilities.name: Truant
abilities.description: This Pokémon cannot use the same move in back to back rounds.
